io.janusproject.services.network

Class EventDispatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.services.network.EventDispatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EventDispatch
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Description of the required information for dispatching an event over the network.

    A EventDispatch can be transformed into/from a EventEnvelope with a EventSerializer.

    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    See Also:
    EventEnvelope, EventSerializer, Serialized Form
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel
